entry.title: Letter Opener
entry.summary:
Vendor: Machakos Co-op Union, Kenya
Type: each
Price: 12.00

Wise Man Letter Opener

Will open any envelope with ease and look great on your desk. Hand-carved in Kenya by MCU from sustainably harvested jacaranda, replaced by seedlings from MCU's tree nursery. MCU has embarked on an environmental conservation program to rehabilitate the forests, including a tree nursery project. 7.5 " length.

  MACHAKOS CO-OP UNION, KENYA

Begun in 1987 to market handicraft products for its members locally and internationally, MCU now works with over 20 women self help groups and 6 handicraft co-operative societies within the marginalised areas, bringing together over 6000 individual members. Education to producer members and provision of social amenities are coordinated by MCU. MCU has embarked on an environmental conservation program to rehabilitate the forests. A tree nursery project was initiated to check on this balance. WFTO member.

entry.title: Backscratchers
entry.summary:
Vendor: Machakos Co-op Union, Kenya
Type: each
Price: 17.95 - 19.95 (2 variants)

Backscratchers

Choose from 2 backscratchers, handcarved in Kenya from brown olive wood. Elephant backscratcher is 11" long, regular backscratcher is 16" long.  Either will lend a hand relieving any itch, including those in the worst places - where you can’t reach. Will adorn any room when not in use. Handmade in Kenya by MCU.

  MACHAKOS CO-OP UNION, KENYA

Begun in 1987 to market handicraft products for its members locally and internationally, MCU now works with over 20 women self help groups and 6 handicraft co-operative societies within the marginalised areas, bringing together over 6000 individual members. Education to producer members and provision of social amenities are coordinated by MCU. MCU has embarked on an environmental conservation program to rehabilitate the forests. A tree nursery project was initiated to check on this balance. WFTO member.

entry.title: Animal Doorstoppers
entry.summary:
Vendor: Machakos Co-op Union, Kenya
Type: each
Price: 17.95

DOOR STOPPER

Let the breeze flow with these functional and attractive handcarved wooden door stoppers. Choice of Giraffe, Zebra or Elephant. Made in Kenya by MCU. MCU has embarked on an environmental conservation program to rehabilitate the forests, including a tree nursery project.

  MACHAKOS CO-OP UNION, KENYA

Begun in 1987 to market handicraft products for its members locally and internationally, MCU now works with over 20 women self help groups and 6 handicraft co-operative societies within the marginalised areas, bringing together over 6000 individual members. Education to producer members and provision of social amenities are coordinated by MCU. MCU has embarked on an environmental conservation program to rehabilitate the forests. A tree nursery project was initiated to check on this balance. WFTO member.

entry.title: Tree Branch Salad Servers
entry.summary:
Vendor: Machakos Co-op Union, Kenya
Type: each
Price: 19.95

Tree Branch Salad Servers

Handcarved wooden salad servers. Made in Kenya by artisans with MCU from sustainably harvested olive wood. MCU has a tree nursery & forest conservation projects. Farmers are given seedlings to plant on their farms during rainy season. Hand wash recommended.

32 cm long x 8 cm w

 

  MACHAKOS CO-OP UNION, KENYA

Begun in 1987 to market handicraft products for its members locally and internationally, MCU now works with over 20 women self help groups and 6 handicraft co-operative societies within the marginalised areas, bringing together over 6000 individual members. Education to producer members and provision of social amenities are coordinated by MCU. MCU has embarked on an environmental conservation program to rehabilitate the forests. A tree nursery project was initiated to check on this balance. WFTO member.

entry.title: Zebra Crossing Sisal Handbag
entry.summary:
Vendor: Machakos Co-op Union, Kenya
Type: each
Price: 50.00

SISAL HANDBAG

This sturdy yet fashionable handbag goes with everything and is ready for action. Each piece is laboriously crafted from hand-twisted sisal in the traditional wakamba method of open weaving. The colouration is achieved wih natural dyes, using mango leaf, tree bark or plant roots. Over the shoulder leather handles are 28" long. Made in Kenya by MCU. 

  MACHAKOS CO-OP UNION, KENYA

Begun in 1987 to market handicraft products for its members locally and internationally, MCU now works with over 20 women self help groups and 6 handicraft co-operative societies within the marginalised areas, bringing together over 6000 individual members. Education to producer members and provision of social amenities are coordinated by MCU. MCU has embarked on an environmental conservation program to rehabilitate the forests. A tree nursery project was initiated to check on this balance. WFTO member.
